KoBo: how often you can buy this offer.
KoBo: this can refer to different offers like "10 Wood", "5 Sheep", "1 Entertainer", "3 Mercenaries".
use in the weather in game menu
KoBo: This is the Bar underneath a Need Icon in a Building Selection Menu, e.g. the Dairy's Menu. It shows how much longer the inhabitants will work before getting a{cr}Good for this Need.
KoBo: Diplomacy States are, from worst to best: Enemy, Undecided, EstablishedContact, TradeContact, Allied.

KoBo: This is used for the pop-up widgets that appear beneath the Gold counter when the Tax Collector returns, Soldier Payment is paid, a {cr}Trade Cart with Gold arrives, a Trade Cart with Gold is robbed, etc.
KoBo: This is used for the pop-up widgets that appear beneath the City Reputation bar when there are new Spouses after a festival, and when Spouses are robbed by{cr}vikings.
KoBo: Used to Start a Quest speech again. No Stop functionality, actually.
KoBo: The maximum Title that can be achieved on this map. It's Archduke in standard Singleplayer and Multiplayer maps; it's variable on Campaign maps.

KoBo: Refers to a counter that can count either Goods or Entities.

KoBo: Check for intentionally identical texts:{cr}in the text key without "Abilities_" in this same section. E.g. for "Abilities_U_MilitarySword" check "U_MilitarySword".{cr}Also in "Buy...", e.g. "BuySwordfighters".

KoBo: The Thief has the ability to find out what City Reputation the player has who owns the territory the Thief is standing on.
KoBo: The Thief has the ability to find out what City Reputation the player has who owns the territory the Thief is standing on.
Refers to the special edition statues, pillar, pavilion.
Name of the GUI feature to select and control multiple units.
Refers to selecting all the units of the multiselection buttons.
Button to stop production in all buildings of the selected type.
Button to resume production in all buildings of the selected type.
Button to reserve produced goods of the selected building type.
Button to resume consumption of the Goodtype of the selected building type.
In this case, this refers to Castle, Storehouse, Cathedral, Military buildings and Outposts.
This one is used in the Buildings Menu ("Production Menu")
This one is used in the Buildings Menu ("Production Menu")
used for the quest Log buttons
